name: Australian trip
description: Take a bright and exciting adventure in Australia with dog Dingo. A fascinating and extraordinary puzzle game. Languages: English, Russian, Ukrainian, Latvian, Portuguese, French,...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Core 4 Duo or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 1 MB Video RAM Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Directx 9.0 compatible Sound Card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Core 4 Duo or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 2GB Video RAM Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Directx 9.0 compatible Sound Card
